title: Minolta 64 Mega Pixels Auto Focus Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom, 4K Ultra HD Video and Macro Shooting
description: The MNB10Z shoots both long distances and macro shots in crisp detail. Convenient anti-shake stabilization helps keep your shot steady when camera shake is detected. User-friendly features like face detection make it easy to capture the perfect photo and a variety of 10 scene modes plus Intelligent Mode help select the perfect settings for any scene. The camera body has a built-in accessory shoe mount for mounting shooting accessories like an external microphone and LED video light. Includes WiFi for easy control with your smartphone.
